title: Katmai National Park & Preserve: Bearcam FAQ
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia     Webcams     Bearcam FAQ                 Bearcam Frequently Asked Questions        Bears are commonly seen fishing at Brooks Falls in July.        Do you have a question about something you observed on the bearcams? Are you interested in learning more about what you might see? If so, you might find the answer in these frequently asked questions. Follow the links below to browse questions on bears, salmon, and other animals. Brown Bear Frequently Asked Questions Sockeye Salmon Frequently Asked Questions Other Frequently Asked Questions    If you don’t find an answer to your question here, rangers often answer questions during video and text chats when the cams are live. Times and dates for these chats vary, so be sure to follow us on Google+, Twitter, and Facebook for the latest updates. Live chats will also be advertised on the event calendar.
